org.sakaiproject.util

Class EmailNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.util.EmailNotification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationAction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DropboxNotification, SiteEmailNotification

    public class EmailNotification
extends Object
implements NotificationAction

    EmailNotification is the notification action that handles the act of message (email) based notify, site related, with user preferences.

    The following should be specified to extend the class:

    • getRecipients() - get a collection of Users to send the notification to
    • getHeaders() - form the complete message headers (like from: to: reply-to: date: subject: etc). from: and to: are for display only
    • htmlContent() - form the complete html message body (minus headers)
    • plainTextContent() - form the complete plain text message body (minus headers)
    • getTag() - the part of the body at the end that identifies the list

    getClone() should also be extended to clone the proper type of object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EmailNotification.RunSendToUsers
      Using this class to send the emails in a thread so that if anything dies we don't kill the process that is attempting to send them emails, this also keeps the email process from suspending the other process while it does its thing -AZ

      • reNotify

        public void reNotify(String notificationId,
            String resourceFilter,
            int eventPriority,
            Event event)
        Resends a notification using the bits of data pulled from the original Notification and Event objects passed into notify(Notification, Event). Specifying the bits of information to be used allows notifications to be partially serialized and delayed to run later. This becomes prominent when sending out emails to unavailable resources.
        Parameters:
        notificationId - ID of the original notification.
        resourceFilter - The resource filter to be used.
        eventPriority - The priority level of the event.

      • immediateRecipients

        protected List immediateRecipients(List recipients,
                       Notification notification,
                       Event event)
        Filter the recipients Users into the list of those who get this one immediately. Combine the event's notification priority with the user's notification profile. Alias call to immediateRecipients(List, String, String, int)
        Parameters:
        recipients - The List (User) of potential recipients.
        notification - The notification responding to the event.
        event - The event that matched criteria to cause the notification.
        Returns:
        The List (User) of immediate recipients.

      • immediateRecipients

        protected List immediateRecipients(List<String> recipients,
                       String notificationId,
                       String resourceFilter,
                       int eventPriority,
                       Event event)
        Filter the recipients Users into the list of those who get this one immediately. Combine the event's notification priority with the user's notification profile. Copy of immediateRecipients(List, Notification, Event) that accepts more succinct data.
        Parameters:
        recipients - The List of potential recipients.
        notificationId - ID of the notification.
        resourceFilter - The resource filter to be applied.
        eventPriority - The priority of the event.
        Returns:
        The List of immediate recipients.

        Parameters:

      • digestRecipients

        protected List digestRecipients(List recipients,
                    String notificationId,
                    String resourceFilter,
                    int eventPriority,
                    Event event)
        Filter the recipients Users into the list of those who get this one by digest. Combine the event's notification priority with the user's notification profile.
        Parameters:
        recipients - The List (User) of potential recipients.
        notificationId - The ID of the notification responding to the event.
        resourceFilter - The resource filter to use for narrowing search.
        eventPriority - The event priority that matched criteria to cause the notification.
        Returns:
        The List (User) of digest recipients.
